valueString: Using this patient's age, gender, and serum creatinine value of 1.2,.  Estimated GFR = 57 if non African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  Estimated GFR = 69 if African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  For comparison, mean GFR for age group 70+ is 75 (mL/min/1.73 m2).  GFR<60 = Chronic Kidney Disease, GFR<15 = Kidney Failure.  This POC estimated GFR is within 10% of the correct value..
